name: Tea Cups
text: I always get the sub with bacon and ham. I've had to spit out every bite due to the meat being nothing but CHEWY FAT. I do not prefer chewy sandwiches. Its quite annoying, enjoying the flavor but cannot fully chew your food because it is the consistency of gum.

text: Great service, love how fresh the food is. Their $5.55 lunch specials are a nice lunch choice.  Love it all!!

text: We ordered when it first opened and it was horrible.  Tried it again tonight and somehow it has gotten worse.  We ordered wings with our pizza and the wings were complete mush.  The breading was completely drenched to the point of being inedible.   The pizza was still the chewy, tasteless cardboard it was the first time.

text: Just tried it for the first time and it was the best chicken wings and sub I've ever had and the pizza was just as good. But man that sub and the wings stood out.

text: Wanted to go here for dinner. We arrived at 9pm. It closes at midnight. The doors were locked despite all the open signs being on and the shop was well lit. Employees clearly saw us at the door and gave no explanation. Instead of knocking and trying to speak to them we went over to the Zaxbys instead. Will not be back.

text: Greatest pizza the world!! It's always hot and fresh. After eating here you'll not (papa huts). I  love the stuff crust. You can do all kinds of flavors. Their extra toppings amount is crazy. They have everything!

name: Lissa
text: Pizza was fresh and delicious!

name: Raine Lo
text: Pizza was made to order. I didn't have to wait long. Had a nice conversation with the employees. And for what I ordered I only paid $20! Conveniently located close to home in hickory on springs rd. and open til 1 so late night after-work dinner is always great. Definitely would recommend to friends and family.

name: ken hammonds

text: I've never had a negative experience here and the staff have always been very friendly and helpful. If I had questions about the menu they were knowledgeable and patient. The flavored crusts are awesome and I love that they offer gluten free crust. Would def recommend :)

text: Hit or miss. Sometimes the food is great, hot, and on time. Other times it is wrong, cold, and late. Don't order the steak sub if you like steak! It was kind of a lettuce and mushroom sub with a little steak.

text: Ordered from here because it was advertised in a hotel where we were staying. It was the most disgusting food we've ever eaten. The crust tasted old and had a seriously fermented yeast flavor. My kids each took one bite and refused to eat â€¦More
